title: APM Monitoring
description:
## APM Monitoring

This dashboard includes telemetry about your Indexed Spans and all telemetry sent by the Datadog Agent.

[APM metrics sent by the Datadog Agent documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/tracing/troubleshooting/agent_apm_metrics/)

Click on any graph to scope the dashboard to a specific:

* Environment
* Hostname
* Service

definition.content:
This scatter plot displays the ratio of spans indexed vs the overall amount of spans ingested per service

The more a service is in the upper right corner the more it might impact your indexation costs as it means it's indexing  a high % of spans from an elevated amount of spans ingested
